name: Goobers
description:
Part of the Brackeys 2021.1 Game Jam

Jump, move, double jump and gravitationally invert your way through 11 levels in Goobers!

Rescue your little goober pals and make your way to the exit, some'll even help you out and give you new powers!

You can either play this game on your browser (Firefox recommended) or download a 32-bit or 64-bit version for Windows

Created by surr sloidah and Sam Holt:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCesiaNX8UuhVjYWF_gjiQ8w

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0IYXxjy3xoFic-iuJ_4j5g
